definition: a regular journey of some distance to and from your place of work, to exchange or replace with another, usually of the same kind or category
details:
noun
- a regular journey of some distance to and from your place of work
= example: a regular journey of some distance to and from your place of work
verb
- to exchange or replace with another, usually of the same kind or category
= synonyms: exchange
- to exchange a penalty for a less severe one
= synonyms: exchange
- to change the order or arrangement of
= synonyms: transpose, permute
- to exchange positions without a change in value
= example: to exchange positions without a change in value
= synonyms: transpose
- to travel back and forth regularly, as between one's place of work and home
